abilities.name: Creature Sense.
abilities.description: The neothelid is aware of the presence of creatures within 1 mile of it that have an Intelligence score of 4 or higher. It knows the distance and direction to each creature, as well as each creature's Intelligence score, but can't sense anything else about it. A creature protected by a mind blank spell, a nondetection spell, or similar magic can't be perceived in this manner.

abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
abilities.description:
The neothelid's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 16). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
At will: levitate
1/day each: confusion, feeblemind, telekinesis

abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
abilities.description: The neothelid has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
